mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART( USER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, QUANTITY, TOTAL_PRICE, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_COLOR ) VALUES( #{user_no}, #{product_no}, #{product_name}, #{quantity}, #{total_price}, #{product_color}, #{product_size} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.cart_no, a.user_no, a.product_no, a.product_name, a.product_size, a.product_color, a.quantity, a.total_price, b.delivery_fee, b.discount, b.discount_rate, b.main_image FROM CART AS A JOIN PRODUCT AS B on a.product_no = b.product_no and user_no = #{user_no};
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET QUANTITY = #{quantity}, PRODUCT_COLOR = #{product_color}, PRODUCT_SIZE = #{product_size}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{total_price} WHERE CART_NO = #{cart_no}
